replies.body:
If you hadn't used the boards in quite a while, it would have caused your Boards and Summoner profiles to fall out of sync. This discussion post seems to have caused a sync to happen, so you should be good to go.

Let me know if you have if you have any further issues with this.

Heard this one before. It takes a little while to update the boards for whatever reason, so some accounts may have actions restricted.  Usually, trying to post or otherwise attempting to perform the restricted action is enough to do it.

So basically it's an issue that fixes itself.   ...And I'm seeing you as Level 28 right now, so give it a shot.
